item.title: Volkswagen shares plunge on emissions scandal, Germany plans own probe - Reuters
item.description:
Reuters
Volkswagen shares plunge on emissions scandal, Germany plans own probe
Reuters
BERLIN Volkswagen shares plunged more than 20 percent on Monday, their biggest ever one-day fall, after news the German carmaker had rigged U.S. emissions tests, and Germany said it would investigate whether data had been falsified in Europe too.
